mapper.select:
select
from base_ledger_user where delete_flag=0
and ope_id=#{opeId} and type=0
and reg_id=#{regId} and type=1

select u.id, u.username, u.pwd, u.openid, u.phone, depart_name, u.depart_id, u.depart_code, u.reg_id, u.ope_id, u.type, u.status, u.delete_flag, u.create_by, u.create_date, u.update_by, u.update_date, u.param1, u.param2, u.param3 ,o.management_type as management_type,o.reg_name as regName,b.ope_shop_code as opeShopCode , b.ope_shop_name as opeShopName,b.ope_name as opeName from base_ledger_user u LEFT JOIN base_regulatory_object o on u.reg_id=o.id LEFT JOIN base_regulatory_business b on u.ope_id=b.id where u.delete_flag=0 and openid=#{openid}
mapper.update: UPDATE base_ledger_user SET openid=NULL WHERE id=#{id}
